SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

Class PowerVm

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Vm
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVm
public class PowerVm extends Vm
A class of VM that stores its CPU utilization percentage history. The history is used by VM allocation and selection policies.
If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package please cite the following paper:
  • Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience (CCPE), Volume 24, Issue 13, Pages: 1397-1420, John Wiley invalid input: '&' Sons, Ltd, New York, USA, 2012
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov

    • updateVmProcessing

      public double updateVmProcessing(double currentTime, List<Double> mipsShare)
      Description copied from class: Vm
      Updates the processing of cloudlets running on this VM.
      Overrides:
      updateVmProcessing in class Vm
      Parameters:
      currentTime - current simulation time
      mipsShare - list with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler
      Returns:
      time predicted completion time of the earliest finishing cloudlet, or 0 if there is no next events
